MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: ms.assetid: 90F07341-01F4-4205-8161-92DD2EB49860 title: 3-D perspective effects for XAML UI description: You can apply 3-D effects to content in your Windows Runtime apps using perspective transforms. For example, you can create the illusion that an object is rotated toward or away from you, as shown here.

ImageItem.internal_link_text: Stacking objects to create a 3-D effect
Stacking objects to create a 3-D effect
